## Forelesninger
```{r, echo=F, ,message=F}
library(huxtable)
lecnr <- 1
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),'/forelesninger/timeplan.R'))
# https://hughjonesd.github.io/huxtable/huxtable.html
md <- jsonlite::fromJSON(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),"/data-raw/metadata.json"))
names(df_t) <- c("#","Topic","Chapter","Responsible","Week","Date")
abc <- huxtable::hux(df_t,add_colnames = FALSE) %>% 
	add_colnames() %>%
	set_text_color(2:2, 1:3, "red") %>%
	set_bold(row = lecnr, col = everywhere) %>% 
	set_caption("Changes")
abc
```

```{r}
knitr::knit_exit()
```


## Oppgaveseminar
```{r}
ghi <- huxtable::hux(df_r,add_colnames = FALSE) 
ghi
```


## Anbefalte oppgaver fra boka
```{r}
def <- huxtable::hux(df_o,add_colnames = FALSE) 
def
```
